summary: Eventually it gets tedious to loot every Urn (Burial or otherwise) in a Draugr tomb just so you can find all the pocket change and ancient healing potions.  When it does, install this mod, which relocates all those coins, potions, and jewelry into Draugr tomb chests.
descriptionHtml:
This mod removes loot from Urns found in Draugr tombs and puts them into chests found in Draugr tombs.  HOWEVER, this wasn\'t done manually, so you may recieve less treasure overall using this mod.  Each Draugr chest should contain about 4 urns worth of goods.

This should make exploring tombs less tedious and more immersive.

[u]-Installation-[/u]
Place Eld-emptyUrnsRicherDraugrChests.esp into your Data folder, and enable it using your preferred mod manager.

[u]-Uninstalling-[/u]
Remove Eld-emptyUrnsRicherDraugrChests.esp from your Data folder.

[u]-Credits-[/u]
Thanks to Dave Humphrey for SkyEdit.
author: Eldiran
